summary: The story of Stevie, a construction worker, and his girlfriend, an unemployed pop singer, serves to show the living conditions of the British poor class
cast: Robert Carlyle|Emer McCourt|Jim R. Coleman|George Moss|Ricky Tomlinson|David Finch|Richard Belgrave|Ade Sapara|Derek Young|Bill Moores|Luke Kelly|Gary Lammin|Willie Ross|Dean Perry|Dylan O'Mahony|Brian Coyle|Stuart Peveril|Terry Bird|Jimmy Batten|Tracy Brabin|Debra Gillett|Benjamin Lush|Jayne Charlton McKensie|Johanne Murdock|David Alder|David Taegar|Dominic Barlow|Terry Duggan|Angela Morant|Lila Cherif|Joumana Gil|Zohra El Harrack|Peter Mullan|John Kazek|Anne Marie Timoney|Maureen Carr|James MacDonald|Vicky Murdock|Mike Haydon|Martin Clapson|Tex Comer|Les Davidson|Jimmy Jewel|Len Stonebridge
title: Riff-Raff
